name: Chicken Chile Verde
ingredients: 3 pounds boneless chicken breast, about 6-7 medium
Iceberg lettuce, chopped (not included in counts)
Toppings, see ideas below (not included in counts)

instructions.en: Place the chicken in a slow cooker.
Combine the green salsa, onion, pepper, garlic, jalapeños and bouillon in a small bowl.
Pour the sauce mixture over the chicken and stir to ensure sauce gets under and between all chicken pieces.
Use two forks to shred the chicken once it's tender.
Stir in the cilantro just before serving.
Serve over chopped iceberg lettuce and add desired toppings.

notes: This recipe makes about 10 servings. Can be frozen. Suggested toppings (not included in nutritional counts): Sour cream, pickled jalapeños, chopped green onions, guacamole, salsa, shredded cheese, Cilantro Pepita Sauce, olives, diced tomatoes, etc.
